thread.title: Inside Malavika Mohanan's Mexico Trip: Stunning Street Styles & Daring Shoots
thread.title_full: Inside Malavika Mohanan's Mexico Trip: Stunning Street Styles & Daring Shoots

author: Aarti Tiwari
title: Inside Malavika Mohanan's Mexico Trip: Stunning Street Styles & Daring Shoots
text:
South diva Malavika Mohanan made a perfect start to the year with a well-deserved ‘me time’ on her foreign vacation. This time, the actress landed in Mexico, which is home to the second-largest coral reef in the world. Sharing the insights from her fun-filled vacation, the actress shared a couple of posts, including a bunch of photos showcasing the highlights from her trip. Let’s have a deep look below.
Taking to her Instagram, Malavika shared two posts with highlights from her vacation. From street walks to daring adventures, the actress had great fun on her trip. The earlier photos show a glimpse of Malavika’s mind-blowing photoshoot inside the breathtaking water covered with coral reefs, creating a mesmerizing view. She posed like a queen, wearing a swimsuit with a hat on her head.
In the other post, Malavika shared a glimpse of her fun-filled day. She styled her look in a stunning white kaftan maxi dress with a red floral print. Leaving her hair open, blushing her cheeks and red lips added a wow factor. The black glasses made her look vacation-ready. From strolling around the streets of the city, exploring the heritage, beautiful places, clothes shops, and art galleries to enjoying street food and a healthy breakfast, she had a great time. Check out all the pictures for full details. Expressing her Mexico adventure, she captioned the post, “Oh Mexico, you were all that I imagined and so much more.”
